results.description: Iranian women have attended a World Cup qualifier in Tehran for a men's match after being freely allowed to enter a stadium.
results.title: Iranian women attend first match in decades

results.description: Fifa says it is "firm and committed" over women's access to football matches in Iran despite claims quicker action could have saved the life of an activist.
results.shortTitle: Fifa 'firm' on access to Iran matches
results.title: Fifa will 'stand firm' on women's access to Iran matches

thumbnail.altText: Female Iranian football fans attend a an AFC Asian Cup quarter-final between China and Iran in January 2019 in Abu Dhabi

results.description: Some 3,500 tickets for Iran's World Cup qualifier against Cambodia on Thursday have been sold to female fans.
results.title: Iran v Cambodia: Women buy 3,500 tickets for World Cup qualifier

thumbnail.altText: Female Iranian football fans attend a screening of a 2018 World Cup match at the Azadi Stadium in Tehran

results.description: Fifa president Gianni Infantino says Iran must allow women into football stadiums and hopes to see a change for the country's World Cup qualifier with Cambodia next month.
results.shortTitle: Iran must let women into grounds - Fifa
results.title: Iran must let women into football grounds, says Fifa president Gianni Infantino

results.description: El Ministerio de Defensa de Arabia Saudita mostró este miércoles restos de drones y misiles de crucero que, en criterio de Riad, "prueban" la participación iraní en los ataques del fin de semana contra dos instalaciones petroleras.
results.shortTitle: Las "pruebas armamentísticas" y otros detalles revelados por Arabia Saudita sobre el ataque contra sus instalaciones petroleras
results.title: Ataques a Arabia Saudita: las revelaciones presentadas por Riad sobre los atentados contra sus instalaciones petroleras

results.description: El caso de la mujer de 29 años ha provocado consternación en el mundo del deporte y nuevas críticas contra las restrictivas normas para las mujeres en Irán.
results.title: La joven iraní que se prendió fuego después de que le negaran la entrada a un estadio de fútbol

results.description: As Iran's football league season begins, the government is criticised for not having guaranteed the attendance of women at matches.
results.shortTitle: Iranian government criticised as deadline looms
results.title: Iranian government criticised as women stadium entry deadline looms

thumbnail.altText: Iranian football supporters during screening of football match between Iran and Spain in Azadi stadium in the capital Tehran on June 20, 2018

results.description: A Tehran-based bike-share company has drawn ire over reports that women can't register on its app.
results.title: Iranian app bashed for refusing service to women

results.description: Fifa president Gianni Infantino has written to Iran's football federation to ensure that women will be allowed to attend 2022 World Cup qualifiers.
results.title: Fifa president Gianni Infantino seeks assurances women can attend 2022 World Cup qualifiers in Iran

thumbnail.altText: Female Iran fans watch a game

results.description: Former Manchester United assistant manager Carlos Queiroz is appointed coach of Colombia's national football team.
results.title: Carlos Queiroz: Colombia role for former Manchester United assistant boss

results.description: The team of Mani Djazmi, Heather O'Reilly, Pat Nevin and Peter Odemwingie choose their highlight of 2018.
results.title: World Football: BBC team choose their highlight of 2018

results.description: Multiple gunshots can be heard as soldiers and civilians take cover from the attack.
results.shortTitle: Moment gunmen open fire on Iran military parade
results.title: Footage shows moment gunmen open fire on Iran military parade

thumbnail.altText: Scene in Iran shows moment of shooting

results.description: Vuelven a regir las sanciones de Estados Unidos a Irán, luego de que el presidente Donald Trump sacara a EE.UU. del histórico acuerdo logrado por su antecesor para limitar el programa nuclear de Irán a cambio de levantarle dichas restricciones. Te contamos en qué consisten.
results.title: ¿Cuáles son las sanciones que Estados Unidos vuelve a imponerle a Irán y a quiénes afectan?

altText: Donald Trump firmando el acuerdo para revocar sanciones

results.description: Relive the most watched moments from the 2018 World Cup in Russia, including amazing celebrations, player theatrics and goalkeeping howlers.
results.shortTitle: Celebrations, theatrics & howlers: World Cup's most watched moments
results.title: World Cup 2018: Neymar, Neuer & Batshuayi - the most watched moments from Russia

results.description: Iran striker Sardar Azmoun retires from international football at 23, claiming his mother has become seriously ill because of insults he has received.
results.shortTitle: 'Iranian Messi' retires saying insults made his mum ill
results.title: World Cup 2018: Sardar Azmoun retires from playing for Iran at 23

results.description: Two matches, 2,000km and VAR - how the controversy of a crazy World Cup night unfolded.
results.shortTitle: VAR - how 'it all got a little weird'
results.title: VAR: Cristiano Ronaldo, Portugal & Spain get to grips with system

results.description: World Cup host city Samara was the centre of the Soviet space race, but as that industry declined so did the stadiums of its football teams, discovers Patrick Jennings.
results.shortTitle: Samara, football and the story of the space race
results.title: World Cup 2018: Russian city Samara, football and the space race

thumbnail.altText: Two cut-out footballers by the Soyuz carrier rocket monument in Samara
